title: Adobe Delivery Feedback Events

xdm:retryCount.title: Retry Count
xdm:retryCount.description: Number of failed attempts before the current event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: The campaign activity originating a message to a recipient.

xdm:id.title: Delivery ID
xdm:id.description: The campaign activity originating this message.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Id
xdm:campaignId.description: Campaign of which this delivery was a part.

xdm:from.title: From
xdm:from.description:
Address used as a from/sender/caller address. Depending on the communication channel, the `address` has a different format.

  * `email`: an email address.
  * `textMessage` or `phone`: a shortcode or phone number.

xdm:type.title: Delivery Type
xdm:type.description: Mode of delivery for the messages sent.

xdm:label.title: Delivery Label
xdm:label.description: A human-friendly name of the campaign activity which is originating this message.

xdm:name.title: Delivery Internal Name
xdm:name.description: A human-friendly identifier of the campaign activity which is originating this message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: A single message sent to a recipient.

size.title: Message Size
size.description: Size in bytes of the message.

xdm:to.title: To
xdm:to.description:
Address used as a to/callee address. Depending on the communication channel, the `address` has a different format.

  * `email`: an email address.
  * `textMessage` or `phone`: a shortcode or phone number.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Whether this message message event describes the BCC, CC or To recipient.

xdm:canonicalReason.title: Canonical Reason
xdm:canonicalReason.description: Canonicalized text of the response returned by the remote server due to a failed delivery attempt.

xdm:reason.title: Reason
xdm:reason.description: Unmodified, exact response returned by the remote server due to a failed delivery attempt.

xdm:errorCode.title: Error Code
xdm:errorCode.description: Error code by which the remote server described a failed delivery attempt.

xdm:bounceType.title: Bounce Type
xdm:bounceType.description: Classifies whether it is a soft bounce or hard bounce.

xdm:bounceClass.title: Bounce Class
xdm:bounceClass.description: Classification code for a given message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: Solution Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.description: List of solution specific key value pairs.

xdm:type.title: Channel Type
xdm:type.description: Classifies whether the channel is email, push, sms.

xdm:spamType.title: Spam Type
xdm:spamType.description: Type of spam report entered against this message (see RFC 5965 ยง 7.3).

xdm:reportedBy.title: Reported By
xdm:reportedBy.description: E-mail Address of the entity reporting this message as spam.

xdm:reportTo.title: Report To
xdm:reportTo.description: E-mail Address to which this spam report is to be delivered.

xdm:userAgent.title: User Agent
xdm:userAgent.description: Value of the browser's User-Agent header.

xdm:outboundIP.title: IP Address
xdm:outboundIP.description: Outbound IP address of the customer used to deliver the message.

xdm:sendProtocol.title: Send Protocol
xdm:sendProtocol.description: Protocol by which the message is delivered.

xdm:remoteIp.title: IP Address
xdm:remoteIp.description: IP address of the host to which this message is delivered.

xdm:mtaHost.title: Node Name
xdm:mtaHost.description: Name of the MTA Instance originating the events.

xdm:mtaIp.title: Sending IP Address
xdm:mtaIp.description: IP address through which this message was sent.

xdm:queueTime.title: Queue time
xdm:queueTime.description: Delay, expressed in milliseconds, between this message's injection into SparkPost and its delivery to the receiving domain; that is, the length of time this message spent in the outgoing queue.
